item.title: Upin & Ipin Universe launches July 17
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Southeast Asian village life open-world adventure game dated.

Open-world adventure game Upin & Ipin Universe will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on July 17, developer Streamline Studios announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Streamline Studios:

About

Upin & Ipin Universe is a vibrant open-world adventure that brings the charm of tropical Southeast Asian village life to players worldwide. Inspired by the beloved Upin & Ipin animated series, it offers a living, breathing world filled with authentic sights, sounds, and traditions—crafted by Malaysians, for the world.
‍
From bustling markets to quiet rice fields, it captures the essence of kampung (village) life—fireflies at dusk, swaying coconut palms, and the aroma of home-cooked meals. Play as Upin and Ipin on a heartfelt journey, uncovering local legends, helping their community, and immersing themselves in Malaysia’s rich culture, rooted in the heart of Southeast Asia.

Key Features

  • Explore a Vibrant Open-World Kampung – Players will step into a beautifully crafted open-world environment inspired by Kampung Durian Runtuh, filled with authentic Southeast Asian culture and traditions.
  • A Story True to Upin & Ipin‘s Heart – The heartwarming humor, values, and characters from the Upin & Ipin series are woven into engaging quests and gameplay.
  • Family-Friendly Fun – While fans of the beloved series will find familiar faces and stories, Upin & Ipin Universe is designed for all players—offering a heartfelt, exploration-driven adventure that invites the world to experience the beauty of Southeast Asia.
  • Seamlessly Integrated Activities – A variety of to-be-announced activities will be seamlessly woven into the game, encouraging exploration, interaction, and discovery in the open-world environment.
  • A New Adventure in Upin & Ipin‘s World – Upin & Ipin Universe introduces a fully original, canonical storyline, expanding the twins’ world with never-before-seen adventures that deepen the lore and bring fresh experiences to longtime fans and newcomers alike.

‍
